gameEngine

Class PhaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameEngine.PhaseManager

  • public class PhaseManager
extends java.lang.Object

    PhaseManager

    The PhaseManager is responsible for managing the game phases: initialization phase, reinforcement phase, attack phase, and fortification phase.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Sourabh Rajeev Badagandi
